name: A Midsummer Night's Tree
description:
A MIDSUMMER NIGHT'S TREE is a top-down pick-up-and-deliver game in a moody lagoon in the middle of the night. Pick up the Constellation Glyphs, return them to their proper towers, and restore the Great Star Tree! This game plays in nearly any browser. More hints and how-to-play instructions are in the game. Enjoy!

By let-off studios

MICA Game Lab Global Game Jam 2021
